Parameters: The @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchaseResult_E@ containing the result of the purchase.
onInAppPurchaseFinished(com.google.andro.Description: Called when the user has completed an in-app purchase transaction. The publisher is responsible for crediting the user with the product, and calling @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchaseResult#finishPurchase_E@ to consume the purchase.

Parameters: The product ID (SKU) of the requested product.
isValidPurchase(java.lang.String).Description: Called when the user triggers an in-app purchase. Return true if this purchase is valid.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for implementing an in-app purchase using the default purchase flow.
